title: Institution
description: Represents a formal institution, such as a university, church, or foundation.

institutionId.description: A unique identifier for the institution.

institutionName.description: The full name of the institution.

acronym.description: The common acronym for the institution (e.g., 'MIT', 'UN').

foundingDate.description: The date the institution was founded.

missionStatement.description: A brief statement of the institution's mission or purpose.

parentInstitutionId.description: The unique identifier of the parent institution or governing body, if applicable.

keyPersonnel.description: A list of key leadership, such as President, Dean, or Pastor.

personId.description: The unique identifier of the person.

role.description: The person's role in the institution (e.g., 'President', 'Director').

phoneNumbers.description: A list of contact numbers for the institution.

type.description: The type of phone number (e.g., 'main office', 'admissions').

emailAddresses.description: A list of official email addresses for the institution.

type.description: The type of email address (e.g., 'general inquiries', 'media relations').

addresses.description: A list of physical addresses for the institution's locations or campuses.
